posts.title: Understanding Density Functional Theory in Machine Learning
posts.excerpt: An introduction to how machine learning can accelerate density functional theory calculations for materials science applications.

posts.title: Flow Matching for Molecular Structure Prediction
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to understanding flow matching techniques and their applications in predicting molecular structures, especially for MOFs.

posts.title: My Journey at ICML 2024
posts.excerpt: Reflections on presenting our work on Gaussian Plane-Wave Neural Operators at ICML 2024 in Vienna. Key takeaways and memorable discussions.

posts.title: Equivariant Neural Networks for Physics
posts.excerpt: Exploring how equivariant neural networks preserve physical symmetries and why this is crucial for scientific machine learning applications.

posts.title: Getting Started with Quantum Chemistry Simulations
posts.excerpt: A beginner-friendly guide to quantum chemistry simulations, covering basic concepts, popular software packages, and practical examples.

posts.title: NeurIPS 2025: Two Papers Accepted!
posts.excerpt: Excited to share that two of our papers have been accepted to NeurIPS 2025! One spotlight on QHFlow and one poster on flexible MOF generation.
